initialize(address,address).details: Called by proxy to initialize this contract

lastTimeRewardApplicable().details: Returns timestamp of last reward update

notifyRewardAmount(uint256,uint256).details: Notify that reward is added. Also updates reward rate and reward earning period.

updateReward(address).details: Updated reward for given account. Only Pool can call

RewardPaid(address,uint256).notice: Emitted whenever any user claim rewards

GRACE_PERIOD().notice: Once reward end is triggered, owner has to wait at least grace period to expire before he can withdraw remaining reward.

lastUpdateTime().notice: Last reward drip update time stamp

periodFinish().notice: Where is current reward period ending

rewardPerTokenStored().notice: Reward per token calculated and stored at last drip update

rewardToken().notice: Reward token address, mostly it will be VSP

rewards(address).notice: User => Rewards earned till last reward update

userRewardPerTokenPaid(address).notice: User => Reward per token stored at last reward update
